description: jaguar with an elongated body; small head; short legs; tail painted on body, lying on animal's back; cream with brown spots and light brown tail; small round opening on back; undecorated cream-colored belly
inscription:
Inscription

on belly, in black: [111572. / Zuni, N.M. / Stevenson. / Bur. Ethn. / EXCHANGE]
object_name: Canteen in the form of a jaguar
title: Canteen in the form of a jaguar
